RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 4. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIERRA DIAMOND dueled on the lead, edged clear in mid stretch, just lasted late under strong handling. AUNT STELLA pressed the pace three wide, rallied in mid stretch and just missed. AVASARALA dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened slightly late. GRAND PRIZE was never far back, angled out and lacked a late response.

ENTRY.NAME: Avasarala
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Prize
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never far back, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the leadf, edged clear in mid stretch, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Stella
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed the pace three wide, rallied in mid stretch and just miss

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 18400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 4 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances). .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLLIN ON TEQUILA was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout, lugged in through the stretch and lasted late under left handed urging. BOOT LEGGER raced mid pack early, rallied four wide and was second best. THIS MAN CAN had good position on the inside and went evenly late. OHIO CAUSE chased the winner and went evenly late. CANT BUY COOL well placed early was no threat,late. JACK BE FAST broke in the air and was outrun. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action.

ENTRY.NAME: This Man Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position on the inside and went evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Be Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in the air and was outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Boot Legger
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced mid pack early, rallied four wide and was second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Buy Cool
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed early was no threat,late

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin On Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Cause
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Trusso Tony
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the winner and went evenly late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 43. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLAYING BALL was never far back while racing wide, rallied in the stretch five wide, finished well and drew off late. PALACE TEMPTATION pressed the early speed, rallied in the stretch and was up for place. FAST AS FAST CAN B was away alertly and quickly made the lead, lost bandage on the turn and weakened in mid stretch. OXBOW'S RIDE raced inside and went evenly. MARK'S BUDDY JACIN raced mid pack and was no threat. WHISKEY HELPS saved ground and was outrun. A K A FIBBER MCGEE was no factor.

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, and wass outrun,

ENTRY.COMMENT: raced inside and went evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 51. Claiming Purse 17100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 4 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY ABRIL was well placed early, swung wide in the stretch, lost whip at the top of the stretch, drew off late under a strong hand ride. SHADY BABY dueled on the lead throughout, was outfinished late but was clearly second best. BEAUTIFUL VICTORIA allowed to settle, saved ground and went evenly. WAR MOON dueled on the lead and tired in the stretch. LACY QUEEN allowed to settle, failed to menace. ALL THE BEST raced on the inside and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: All the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced on the inside and was outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Abril
ENTRY.COMMENT: was well placed early swung wide in the stretch lost whip,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 4 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KISSTHECROSS had good position throughout, rallied five in the stretch, closed determinedly and edged clear. APPEALING SENORITA raced mid pack early, rallied on the turn on the inside, drew even in mid stretch and just missed. MY PINK BABY BIRD raced close up throughout, swung wide in the stretch and finished willingly. BAREFOOT BEACH allowed to settle, rallied six wide and closed a gap. PRICEY APPEAL was unhurried early and improved late. GLIMMERGLASS set the pace until mid stretch and faltered late. MILWAUKEE CAT raced mid pack and went evenly. EASTER PRIDE saved ground and was outrun. ONLY ONE BOSS LADY had good position on the inside and gave way.

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, and was outrun

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-wi nners Of A Race Since December 4 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RENO TOUCH was away alertly and pressed the early pace, rallied on the turn three wide, drew clear in mid stretch and lasted late under firm handling. WINE ME UP BABY set the pace and dueled on the inside, angled out in the stretch, finished willingly and was second best. TEMPLEMENT was allowed to settle while racing wide, rallied in the stretch and closed willingly. BAREBACK FUN dueled on the lead while between horses and weakened in the stretch. CEVICHE was outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace and dueled on the inside, angled out in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 27. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PATTI LOU was unhurried early, angled out five wide in the stretch, closed stoutly and drew off late under firm handling. TITEBLUEJEANS had good position throughout, rallied three wide and drew even in mid stretch, was no match late but was second best. MUSIC CITY DANCER set the pace and weakened in mid stretch. SHANGHAI ROYALTY raced wide throughout and was no menace. BRICK OF HEARTS pressed the pace on the inside and faltered in mid stretch. MOTOWN HARBOR saved ground and was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YIPPEE KI YAY dueled on the lead throughout, prevailed after a long battle, gamely. CAVALETTO dueled with the winner throughout and finished gamely to just miss. TIER ONE was well placed early, rallied four wide and closed willingly. SLICK EDDIE was never far back, lacked a late bid and went evenly. RAY'S EMPIRE stalked the pace five wide and was no threat late. HARSH TRUTH allowed to settle on the inside, failed to menace. PAYMASTER GENERAL was outrun. CONSTITUTION COAL contended for a half, then gave way. MOONLIGHT MEISTER was outrun. COUNCIL OF FOUR was no factor.

ENTRY.COMMENT: was outrun,
